listing_cancellation_info.cancellation: No refund after booking

listing.listing_description:
Find plenty of alpine charm and ample room for up to sixteen guests at the perfectly named Winter Castle North. This Steamboat Springs vacation rental has 4,500 square feet of recently remodeled living space and is well suited for a ski break with extended family or a mountain getaway with a group of friends.

After a day on the slopes, unwind in a media room with a television, foosball table and video game system, or soak tired muscles in the outdoor hot tub. For warmer evenings, the villa has a spacious private terrace where you can make dinner on the barbecue and serve it at the al-fresco dining area.

Open-plan living areas invite you to socialize during your stay, while details like broad exposed beams, reclaimed wood floors and custom antler railings add classic mountain charm. In the great room, cozy up to the stone fireplace on the soft leather sectional, grab a seat at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen or gather around in a dining area with seating for ten.

Winter Castle North has five bedrooms with king beds: three with en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite whose mountain views rival those from any honeymoon suite, and two that share a bathroom. The sixth bedroom has two bunk beds, two trundle beds, a shared bathroom and room for up to six kids.

Your holiday at this luxury property includes complimentary seasonal shuttle service, which will pick you up from the driveway during the winter for the 2-minute drive to Steamboat Ski Resort. It’s an equally short trip to City Market and, if you’ll be visiting during the summer, a quick drive to Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course as well. During your time in Colorado, don’t miss the area’s namesake hot springs, from the family-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town to the scenic Strawberry Park Hot Springs, both of which are nearby.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Surf the Manhattan Beach waves and return to barbeque meals, sunset cocktails, and festive nights in the game room. Offering a quintessential experience of this iconic town south of Los Angeles, the villa combines gallery-worthy artwork, a cavernous home cinema, and a gourmet kitchen among other amenities. Glide on bicycles along the The Strand or walk to some of the South Bay's finest nigh spots.

The 3-story house features outdoor living areas on all levels, with completely unobstructed views of the beach and ocean. On the lower terrace, sun loungers beckon you into the Pacific sun, while a barbecue grill serves an alfresco dining table beneath a parasol.

Glass doors open to a bi-level living and dining room, allowing the villa to breathe the sea-kissed air. The lower level includes a comfy lounge and bar, while the upper platform features a dining area and chef-grade kitchen with Miele appliances and marble surfaces. A gas fireplace keeps you toasty during evening wine tastings, while air conditioning provides comfort when necessary.

The entertainment floor brings this villa to the next level. Challenge each other at pool or vintage arcade games, and screen Hollywood classics from the projector while sinking into sumptuous armchairs.

The master suite enjoys exceptional views from its bedroom and private balcony, with a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity. The guestrooms both have queen beds and a shared bathroom with dual vanity.

Famous as the origin of beach volleyball, Manhattan Beach also offers wonderful biking, running, and walking paths, as well as fun-filled activities for families or groups of friends. Venice, Marina del Rey, and Santa Monica are a short drive up the coast, and LAX is less than five miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Transient Occupancy Tax Certificate #65.

Take in bird’s-eye views at Yount Ridge. With the Yountville Hills rising behind and Napa Valley stretching out in front, this stunning California vacation rental commands panoramas of vineyards and mountains. A range of outdoor living spaces make the most of the setting, while 6,300 square feet and three bedrooms make room for up to six friends or family members.

The best place to enjoy the scenery might be the villa’s huge deck, complete with outdoor kitchen, sitting and dining areas, and a cozy firepit. But you’ll have to compare it to the rooftop terrace, which has its own wet bar, living area and firepit, to be sure. On cooler evenings, entertain in the games room inside or unwind with the help of the TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.

When you’re not outside, you’ll want to be in the villa’s expansive open-concept great room, which has inviting sitting and dining areas separated from the fully equipped kitchen by a generous breakfast bar and a few stairs. There’s also a breakfast nook on this level; the games room is on a different level.

Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. As in the main living areas, parquet floors form the backdrop for chic yet comfortable modern furnishings, and the views out the bedroom windows will take you on a honeymoon from the everyday.

While the vistas from Yount Ridge make it seem like you have Napa and Sonoma all to yourself, this private villa is still close to shopping, dining, wineries and more. It’s just across the street from local landmark Mustards Grill and the Cosentino Winery and Tasting Room, and a short drive from the centers of Oakville, Yountville and St. Helena. For a great day trip during your holiday, plan a quiet stroll through Bouverie Wildflower Preserve, hike around Sonoma Valley Regional Park or thrill to the action at Sonoma Raceway.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
In 1947, Frank Sinatra commissioned legendary Palm Springs architect, E. Stewart Williams, to build Twin Palms, a sprawling, four-bedroom, mid-century masterpiece. Composing and carousing were both on the menu during Ol’ Blue Eyes’ tenure, and this historical building still retains its classic Hollywood charm, while recent upgrades have introduced luxurious, contemporary amenities.

Spend easy afternoons reclined in a chaise longue around on the terrace. You’ll swear you can still hear some of that old ring-a-ding-ding as you drift along in the piano-shaped pool. Take shelter from the mid-afternoon sun in the the well-equipped pool house, where you’ll find a cozy lounge set, full changing cabanas, kitchenette and wet bar. At dusk, fire up the barbecue and grill fresh fare as the sun sets over the mountains.

An abundance of floor-to-ceiling windows shed light on the spectacular, mid-century interior. Many of Sinatra’s original touches can still be found, like a vintage audio system, while the home’s newer furnishings and accessories were hand-picked with respect to the original style. Rusty hues and warm woods were typical of that era, still adorn the fine St. Charles cabinets, stone floor tiles, and the living room’s wraparound sofa. A piano is found in the great room, and the whole house is wired with the latest electronics. In the gourmet kitchen, you’ll love creating feasts on high-end Viking appliances, which have been giving a retro makeover. The modern dining table enjoys a lovely terrace view.

All four bedrooms are one-of-a-kind. The Master bedroom is wrapped on two sides by sliding doors to the terrace, and a beautiful masonry fireplace sits at the foot of the King bed. The second bedroom also has quick access to the terrace and its own fireplace. The third bedroom is brightly lit, with a Queen bed and memorabilia hanging on the walls. The final room is a tropical oasis that looks out to the garden. All bedrooms are air conditioned and feature televisions, plus well-appointed en-suites.

You may never want to step out of Frank’s dream house, but when you do, there’s so much to discover in Palm Springs. Cruise down Palm Canyon Drive where you’ll find everything from upscale shops to fine dining, art galleries to vibrant nightlife and more. Appreciate your natural surroundings on one of Palm Springs’ many golf courses or head out to Joshua Tree National Park to experience the beauty of the desert.

Palm Springs Registered Tax Permit Number: 3031

Palm Springs City ID: 1039

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Return home to a roaring fire after a long day on the slopes at this penthouse overlooking the San Juan Mountains. In the morning, ski from the front door to Telluride’s Lower Sundance run or drive 10-minutes to the resort base. Rather take it easy? Sip hot cocoa on the balcony while you enjoy the dynamic mountain view surrounding the city below. Or, drive 6-minutes to do some shopping downtown. 

Peaked ceilings, elevated mountain views, and a bright, modern take on the American ski lodge give this penthouse a character all its own. Stone accents on the fireplace and in the kitchen, as well as wood trim and furnishings, add a rustic touch to the sunny interior. Before dinner, pick the perfect pairing from the wine cooler. Then, let your inner chef run wild in the spacious kitchen, decorated with stainless steel appliances, and another incredible mountain view. After you’ve eaten, see what you can find on Smart TV or take advantage of Cortina Condo’s shared amenities, including a pool, spa, steam rooms, and a fitness center. 

Any time of year, downtown Telluride is bustling with excitement. After dinner at a steakhouse, try some of the best local beers at one of the breweries, dance the night away, or keep it low-key at a classic cocktail bar. In the warmer months, mountain golf offers a unique set of challenges to the game. Fly fishing, rock climbing, and hiking are a few of the other ways to enjoy Colorado’s beautifully rugged terrain.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in between Shooting Star Golf Course, Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, and Teton Village, this luxuriously updated farmhouse enjoys incredibly scenic mountain views and convenient proximity to Jackson Hole’s most exciting attractions. Whether you’re visiting Wyoming to ski, golf, hike, or just enjoy the rugged mountain lifestyle, you’re sure to fall in love with Shooting Star Cabin’s authentic atmosphere and breathtaking surroundings. With accommodations for ten, this cabin is perfect for a family ski vacation, golf trip with friends, or an exciting retreat with colleagues.

From the peaked roof to the barn board siding, down to the log and mortar, Shooting Star Cabin is quintessential Jackson. Inside, exposed wood, rugged stone, and a roaring fire set the tone for an unforgettable vacation experience. Mixed into the rustic-chic decor, you’ll find designer furniture, high-end electronics, and state of the art appliances, all sure to satisfy the most discerning luxury travelers. Throughout the cabin, you’ll find numerous mountain-view framing windows. If you’d like a closer look, head outside and relax in the hot tub while you gaze upon Wyoming’s rugged, natural beauty.

When it’s time for dinner, Shooting Star’s formal dining area has seating for eight, and there’s extra space at the fully-equipped kitchen’s breakfast bar. The cabin is also outfitted with television, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a barbecue, a washer/dryer, and more. The master bedroom features a king sized bed, a gas fireplace, and an en-suite bathroom with dual vanity, stand-alone shower, and bathtub.

Jackson Hole Mountain Resort is one of America’s most celebrated ski destinations, and Shooting Star is just three minutes from its base. If you’d like to explore even more World-class skiing, Snow King Resort is only thirteen miles from home. Yellowstone National Park and Granite Hot Springs are also near enough for afternoon excursions, and if it’s your first time in Wyoming, they are a must-see. And, for vibrant mountain nightlife, Teton Village and the town of Jackson are great places spend a night out.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A sense of play meets sleek modern style at this Mediterranean-inspired villa in Orlando’s Reunion resort community. Little pirates can put out the plank and princesses can put up the drawbridge in themed bedrooms while parents enjoy spa-worthy stone-clad bathrooms. The Four Corners location means you’re 8 miles from Disney World and 19 miles from Universal Studios.

Listen to the water jet splash in the pond while you do some splashing of your own in the villa’s heated pool and hot tub. Savor the sunshine from a lounger on the patio, then serve dinner from the barbecue and linger outside around the fireplace. Finish the evening with a movie in the drive-in-style home theater, refreshments from the wet bar, and a little friendly competition in a Jurassic Park–themed games room.

Slide open the glass wall to connect the patio with an open-plan great room. It’s a bright, airy space whose living area, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen have subtle Moroccan touches, like stitched poufs, patterned rugs, and lantern light fixtures. The look continues in the bedrooms meant for adults, but pirate ship and castle themes in two of the children’s bedrooms make them over-the-top fun.

The villa is 5 minutes or less from the Reunion water park and golf course by car. Drive 8 miles to the Disney parks and 19 miles to the ones at Universal Studios.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.-

listing.listing_description:
Stay in the heart of Steamboat Ski Resort at Mount Yale 611. This Steamboat Springs vacation rental is part of the luxury One Steamboat Place community and overlooks the central plaza. Guests enjoy ski-in, ski-out access to the gondola, five-star shared amenities and well-appointed interiors designed for entertaining family and friends.

One Steamboat Place features a shared pool, hot tub, fitness center, games room, and even a wine cellar and tasting room. The villa also has its own private deck with a barbecue, and a great room with a flat-screen television, Wi-Fi and fireplace that makes a welcome respite after a day out in the snow.

The great room’s open-plan layout also makes it easy for the whole group to gather, whether for a morning coffee at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen, an après-ski meal around the dining table or a favorite movie in the sitting area. The contemporary interiors are filled with thoughtful details, from the professional-grade appliances in the kitchen to a tucked-away office nook just off the great room that’s perfect for catching up on emails.

Four well-appointed bedrooms will help you get plenty of rest to attack the moguls or hike the Colorado peaks. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with its own fireplace, one bedroom with two bunk beds and an en-suite, and one bedroom with two double beds and a hall bath.

Mount Yale 611 puts you in the center of the Steamboat Springs action. It’s only a 1-minute walk from the villa to the gondola, and One Steamboat Place offers a complimentary shuttle to guests during ski season. If you’re taking a summer holiday, book a tee time at Rollingstone Ranch Golf Club, less than 2 miles away. It’s well worth a visit to the town’s namesake hot springs, whether you want to play with your kids on the slides at Steamboat Springs Old Town or relive your honeymoon with a soak at Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated on 5 acres surrounded by rows of vines and verdant foliage, this private, European-inspired home is the ultimate wine country escape. Stroll past a cascading fountain and manicured lawn to reach the rich walnut front doors. Inside, an authentic, soaring vintage stained glass window is a focal point of the entryway. Challenge your crew to a game of shuffleboard or bocce on the courts. 

The interior design scheme blends a sophisticated mix of marble and natural stone. Look up to see oval details on the vaulted ceiling. Visually intriguing antique chandeliers, glass doors, and intricate molding trim flow throughout. Follow the sweeping, custom-made iron staircase to the upper level where you’ll find a sun-drenched terrace—why not pop a bottle of bubbly and watch the sun setting over rolling hilltops beyond? Fragrant wildflowers punctuate the garden with pops of vibrant hues. Take a dip in the raised stone swimming pool and look out onto the seemingly endless vineyard. The spacious outdoor entertainment room set in the vineyard is perfect for gathering everyone together. Light a roaring fire in the outdoor pit by the wisteria-wrapped loggia at nightfall or enjoy a good read in the elegant library with vineyard views by the stone fireplace.

An open chef’s kitchen features delicious mountain vistas, and convenient access to your own crop of fresh produce. Venture outside of the estate to get a taste of Napa’s booming culinary scene at the Oxbow Public Market, book a winery tour in Santa Rosa, or work up a sweat on a multitude of hiking trails at Trione-Annadel State Park. Bodega Bay, a picturesque fishing village, is a pleasant day trip option. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The Brix Estate is a stunning, single-level luxury villa in the Little Tuscany neighborhood of Palm Springs. Featuring beautiful views of the surrounding hills, a superb outdoor pool terrace, and exquisite living areas both inside and out, this unforgettable vacation rental is ideal for destination wedding guests, family reunions, and friend getaways to this world-renowned oasis in the California desert.

Nestled amid gardens of lush flora and lithe palms, the villa's pool terrace is simply gorgeous. The shapely swimming pool, garnished by lovely stones and plants and joined by a delicious hot tub, has the air of a secluded lagoon. Savor fresh desert mornings, long afternoons, and starry nights on elegant loungers and sunbeds. When the sun is high, withdraw into the veranda lounge or gather in the loggia with ample seating and a modern misting feature that keeps you cool. Prepare meals at the lovely outdoor kitchen with top-of-the-line barbeque grill, and savor them at the alfresco table.

Expansive glass doors line the lanai and open to the villa's beautiful interior. Enjoy a fine wine in the living room by the spectacular brick hearth with wood-burning fireplace. Sidle up to the bar with flat-screen TV and adjoining lounge. Prepare meals in the fully equipped kitchen with its stunning wall of exposed brick, and congregate at the dining table for memorable feasts. An additional media room, with sumptuous furnishings, flat-screen TV, and fireplace, is the perfect setting for movie nights.

The spectacular master bedroom suite, occupying one wing of the house, features a king bed, brick hearth with fireplace, espresso machine, private furnished patio overlooking the pool terrace and surrounding hills, and a deluxe ensuite bathroom and spa with stand-alone shower, steam room, and jetted bathtub with garden view. In the opposite wing are three guest bedrooms, two with king size beds and terrace access, one with double bed; all have ensuite bathrooms.

The Brix Estate is perfectly located for enjoying the cultural riches and natural beauty of Palm Springs and the desert. You're just minutes from Palm Springs Art Museum and Moorten Botanical Garden, while several top-shelf golf courses, including Mesquite and Escena, are nearby. Palm Desert is a short drive away, and Coachella is within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

City ID #2773

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy spectacular views and interiors to match at Caldera Newberry. Set on the slopes of Jackson Hole Resort, this beautifully appointed vacation rental is part of Caldera House, an exclusive all-suite property that provides the luxury of a hotel with the comforts of a private home. Invite up to eight friends or family members to join you on a ski holiday to remember in a stunning location.

After a day of skiing, hiking or fly-fishing, repair to the villa’s balcony, which features a hot tub, barbecue, al-fresco dining for six, a firepit and views of Rendezvous Mountain. On cooler evenings, entertain indoors with the help of the media room, Apple TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. There’s also a cozy fireplace and a convenient wine fridge, along with laundry facilities.

Caldera Newberry is laid out around an open-concept great room with incredible design and furnishings by Commune. Natural textures of stone and wood, earth tones of ochre and charcoal, and modern silhouettes lend an inviting sophistication to the living area, while custom millwork defines the dining area and fully equipped kitchen.

The villa has three bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own balcony, and one bedroom with three twin bunk beds that’s wonderful for younger guests. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

The slopeside location of Caldera House gives guests ski-in access from Jackson Hole Resort and puts you just a 1-minute walk from the resort’s aerial tram. For après-ski shopping and dining, make the 2-minute walk to the center of Teton Village or the short drive to the town of Jackson. It’s also an easy trip to the nearest golf course, and while you’re in Wyoming, it’s well worth making the drive to Grand Teton National Park or the south entrance of Yellowstone National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
In the playground of New York’s elite, this elegant Hamptons home is set in the forest 7 miles from Sag Harbor. Swing open the French doors and welcome fresh east coast breeze to cool off a hot summer’s day. Better yet, hop in the swimming pool for a few quick laps while the kids play in the yard. Later, walk 5 minutes to East Hampton’s vibrant Main Street for dinner.

When you’re not enjoying the patio, Casa Cuckoo’s double-height living room is the perfect spot for a pre-dinner cocktail. Just get a fire going, sink into the sofa, and you are set. The farmhouse kitchen, decked-out in blue, is sure to impress, as well as inspire. For casual meals, the island bar is a great social setting, especially when you want a little company in the kitchen. Otherwise, there’s seating for 10 inside, and 8 out.

After dinner, set the kids up with a movie in the family room or light a fire in the backyard for marshmallow toasting. The 10 parking spaces outside make it easy to expand the guest list as do the open concept interior spaces and a furnished terrace. If a late-night snack seems in order, grill some fresh shrimp on the barbecue. And, if you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, the home gym is ready.

Drive 5 minutes to Indian Wells Beach and start your morning with a stroll along the shore. When it’s time for coffee and a croissant, visit Golden Pear, one of the best cafes in the town. Then, spend your afternoon antiquing, sampling local wines, and boutique shopping on Main Street. For dinner, Bostwick’s Chowder House is a staple of the Hamptons. And, the cocktails are as dynamic as the view at The Beacon.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy slopeside living in a premier setting at Sleeping Giant. One of the well-appointed private residences at the exclusive One Steamboat Place resort, this Steamboat Springs vacation rental offers ski-in, ski-out access to a gondola along with luxury amenities. Plan a ski holiday with up to eight friends or family at this four-bedroom retreat.

Guests of the villa are welcome at the shared pool, hot tubs, fitness center and games room at One Steamboat Place. Kids can make friends in the resort’s children’s center while grown-ups enjoy the wine cellar and tasting room or make an appointment for indulgence at the spa. You can also opt to entertain at the villa, thanks to a deck with a gas barbecue, wine fridge and a spacious great room laid out around a cozy gas fireplace.

The great room at Sleeping Giant uses natural textures, plush fabrics and handcrafted details to sophisticated effect. The classic stone fireplace surround is set off by a modern striped area rug and tuxedo-style sectional, and in the adjacent dining area, the handmade table seats ten. The fully equipped kitchen is open to the rest of the space and features a breakfast bar, Viking appliances and colorful cabinets.

Sleeping Giant has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms and two bedrooms with queen beds, one with an en-suite and one with a shared bathroom. For privacy, the king master suite is separated from the other three bedrooms by the great room. Wood-trimmed windows and neutral walls and bedding make the rooms feel serene and welcoming after a day on the slopes or at the springs.

Once nicknamed Ski Town USA, Steamboat Springs still has some of the best runs in Colorado. Guests of Sleeping Giant are just a 1-minute walk from the nearest gondola, and the resort also offers a seasonal shuttle. Bring the kids to Old Town Steamboat Springs to splash in the pools and play on the slides, or your sweetheart to the Strawberry Park springs for a honeymoon-worthy soak and some stargazing. If you’re visiting in warmer weather, test your skill on the Rollingstone Ranch golf course a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Knoll is a stunning luxury villa decorated in typical Mediterranean style. Located in the Hollywood Hills, this villa has been designed by one of Los Angeles’ top designers and exudes all the glamour you would expect from a home in this fabled part of California.Villa Knoll is nestled among lush greenery and is perched high above street level providing its fortunate guests with stunning canyon views.

During your stay at Villa Knoll, you can spend your days in the sun splashing about in the lovely heated swimming pool. Or take a well deserved soak in the soothing bubbles of the hot tub. When not in the water, you can lounge around on the patio with a good book or a game of cards. A barbeque sets the tone for succulent alfresco dining. Indoors, you will find Wi-Fi access, a fireplace and air conditioning. Housekeeping and pre-stocking can be arranged at your request.

The interiors of Villa Knoll are bright and airy. Generous windows allow natural light to enter the home throughout the day. Kick back on the plush couches for a little break from the sun. The open plan dining and kitchen area is simply gorgeous and reflects a Mediterranean country aesthetic.

Four delectable bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at Villa Knoll. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, queen beds and televisions. Each suite also provides access to a balcony from where you can take in the amazing views of Hollywood Hills!

During your stay at Villa Knoll, you will be just minutes away from Universal Studios, the Sunset Strip and the Los Angeles Zoo and Botanical Gardens. This villa makes an ideal retreat for families, groups of friends and corporate retreats. Take a drive out to Rodeo Drive for some celeb spotting as you browse the chic boutiques. In an area known to be nothing but fabulous, should your choice of accommodation be any less? You’ll be California dreamin’ in no time!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Skyline views and solitude are always in style at this trendy villa, just 5 miles outside of downtown Austin. Watch as the sun rises from the terrace while you sip espresso. Do a little reading in a poolside sun chair before heading in for breakfast. Then, set out to explore nearby natural wonders on the trails of Barton Creek Wilderness Park or atop the lookout of Mount Bonnell.

Designed by renowned architect, Bernardo Pozas, this modern villa was created to capture the gorgeous Austin skyline. Gaze out floor-to-ceiling windows, or step outside to multiple balconies for an even better look.  Follow stunning marble-floors through thoughtfully-crafted open concept interiors.

On quieter nights, curl up on the sofa and binge a new series on the streaming tv, or pamper yourself with a long soak in the master ensuite’s spa-like tub. If you’re feeling festive, fire up the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen and grill something fresh from a local market. Then, gather around the fire pit for smores or take the party to the hot tub.

Start the next day with a stroll along the shore of Lady Bird Lake, 6-miles away. Then, make your way downtown for a quick lunch. The taco stands around the convention center are incredible. After you’ve eaten, take a tour of The Contemporary, a cutting-edge art museum or head uptown for a history lesson at Bullock State Museum. At night, the bars on 6th Street are always buzzing.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Meribel Penthouse is a superb mountain villa in Telluride. Situated in the picturesque center of Historic Telluride, just a short walk from Free Gondola, this three-bedroom vacation rental with exquisite indoor and outdoor living and dining areas is a prime choice for skiers, hikers, and film buffs seeking privacy in the heart of this Rocky Mountain gem.

The open-plan living area is the ideal setting for evening relaxation after a long day on the slopes. An entire wall of mountain-view windows illuminates the sumptuous lounge facing the fireplace, which is flanked by a wet bar and a flat-screen TV. The elevated kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and boasts a gorgeous, mountain-view skylight window, a breakfast bar gazing out on picturesque Telluride, and a charming breakfast booth. The formal dining table seats ten for hearty feasts together. To taste the delicious mountain air, step onto the beautiful terrace for an evening barbeque, an alfresco meal, or merely to sip your morning coffee or evening cocktail while admiring the views of Telluride and the surrounding ridges and peaks. Downstairs, a cozy media room with flat-screen TV awaits your for nighttime movies, while a ski locker room allows for an easy start and finish to the day's adventure. Meribel's exquisite décor, including lovely original artwork and elegant furnishings, offers a tastefully contemporary interpretation of classic Rocky Mountain comfort and charm.

The bedrooms provide cozy and elegant settings for afternoon downtime and peaceful nights. The master bedroom features a king bed, private balcony, lounge area, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with steam shower and dual vanity. The primary guest room has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, while the second bedroom has two bunk beds and shares a bathroom with bedroom four, featuring two twin beds.

It would be hard to find a finer location in all of Telluride. Just a minute on foot from the heart of downtown Telluride and a three-minute walk from Free Gondola, you're also minutes by car from Mountain Village. Golfers will enjoy proximity to Telluride Golf Course, while Alta Lakes and the nearby ghost town are just ten miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Business License ID: 014456

listing.listing_description:
Take yourself away to a fabulous mountain setting at Fish Creek Lodge 63. Tucked into the valley below Jackson Hole Mountain Resort in the luxury Shooting Star development, this charming vacation rental boasts incredible views and equally stunning interior design. Its 3,400 square feet and three bedrooms are spacious enough for six friends or family members—or a honeymoon in the scenic heart of Wyoming.

No matter what time of year you visit, you can enjoy the fresh mountain air from a private deck with a barbecue, al-fresco dining for six, a fireplace and a hot tub. Of course, if the snow is too deep outside, you can cozy up indoors in the media room or around the fireplace, wine fridge and Wi-Fi.

Chalet-inspired interiors filled with an eclectic art collection are a holiday from the ordinary. Fish Creek Lodge uses reclaimed timber and stone to nod to its surroundings—along with a double-height window in the great room that frames the mountain views. Whether you’ve spent the day skiing, hiking or relaxing, the sitting area, dining area and breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen are both stylish and inviting.

The lodge has one master bedroom with a king bed, its own gas fireplace and an en-suite bathroom; one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom; and one bedroom with two twin beds and access to a hall bathroom.

The villa is a 10-minute walk to Teton Village and the Shooting Star Golf Course, and less than a 10-minute drive from Grand Teton National Park and skiing at Jackson Hole Mountain Resort. It’s a 20-minute drive to the towns of Jackson and Wilson, but you can also reach their shopping and dining options by a paved bike path. For an unforgettable day trip, catch a geyser eruption at Yellowstone National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Slip into the Hollywood lifestyle in a house where one of the silver screen’s greatest comedians once lived at Chaplin Sunset Villa. Once home to Charlie Chaplin, this historic vacation rental is a charming getaway just above Sunset Boulevard. Use it like a celebrity, as a private hideaway, or as a base to explore the best of Los Angeles.

The villa opens to a lovely courtyard where you can slip into the swimming pool, soak in the hot tub or seek refuge from the California sun on a lounger under the umbrella. Finish the evening with dinner from the barbecue and cocktails on the balcony, or unwind inside by the TV, Wi-Fi and fireplace.

Though Chaplin Sunset Villa has historic bona fides and traditional architectural details, its interiors have been thoughtfully updated for an inviting modern feel. Painted ceiling beams lend a stately feel to the spacious living room, while a pair of french doors floods the formal dining room with sunlight. Prepare a gourmet meal in the fully equipped kitchen, or perch at the breakfast bar with a cup from the espresso machine.

The villa’s three bedrooms can accommodate up groups of up to six friends or family on holiday together. There is one honeymoon-worthy master suite with a California king bed, a fireplace and a balcony, and two bedrooms with queen beds; all three have en-suite bathrooms.

The residence may feel like your own oasis of luxury, but it’s not far from many of the city’s must-sees, including The Grove, Rodeo Drive, the Hollywood Bowl and the Getty Center. Three beaches within a short drive make it easy to try surfing or enjoy a sunset stroll. If you’re traveling with children—or just feeling young at heart—make memories on a day trip to Universal Studios or Disneyland.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The luxury residences at One Steamboat Place provide you with exquisite privacy and world-class Rocky Mountain lodge amenities literally steps from the Steamboat Slopes. Silver Creek Mountain 418, a four-bedroom suite, features mountain views, charmingly classic décor, and room for twelve guests, making it the perfect vacation rental for families and groups of friends seeking peaceful privacy at the heart of one of Colorado's top destinations.

The suite's open plan interior features a wall of slope-view glass doors that fill the interior with lovely mountain light. A large sectional couch and comfy armchairs face the stone hearth with fireplace and mounted flat screen television, the ideal setting for toasty evenings together, while the elegant wooden dining table with seating for ten is where you'll share delicious meals. The kitchen is fully equipped with Viking appliances, and includes a breakfast bar for two. Outside the living area, you'll sip morning coffee and evening drinks on the balcony, and fire up the Viking grill for some hearty barbeque in the crisp mountain air.

Silver Creek Mountain includes four perfectly cozy bedrooms: two with king beds and ensuite bathrooms, one with two charming bunk beds and ensuite bathroom, and one room with queen bed and bunk bed with access too the hallway bathroom. The master bedroom features its own fireplace and dual vanity, as well as stand-alone rain/steam shower and bathtub in its bathroom.

As guests at One Steamboat Place, you'll have access to all of its communal spaces, including the gorgeous Great Room, the classy game parlor, the Little Tykes room for kids, and the outdoor pool and hot tub—perfect for a delicious, restorative soak between the day's activities and the night's festivities.

There may be no better location for enjoying the delights of Steamboat. You're just a one-minute walk from the main entrance to Steamboat Gondola, and you're right at the heart of Mountain Village. City Market and Old Town Steamboat Springs are a short drive away. For golf, you're less than two smiles from Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course. And for a dip in Mother Nature's healing waters, check out Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs, also a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, contact a Villa Specialist.

A flawless mountain sanctuary within walking distance of the Sundance Ski Run, this premium villa is ideal for a cosy, comfortable stay in Colorado's famed Mountain Village. Experience forest views and fresh Rockies air from the sun terrace, a roaring fireplace and luxury living room, plus bright and spacious bedrooms and bathrooms. Skiing, Telluride town and natural attractions are all nearby.

Pulling into the big drive of Stonegate 7 and note a rich wood and stone exterior that helps the home to tastefully blend into the wooded landscape. Begin your morning in the bright and sunny living room, before stepping out onto the viewpoint terrace for a morning coffee and excellent view of the towering San Juan range. Guests will find all the necessities delivered in style and space, with the house’s bubbling hot tub and luxurious floor heating deflecting any wintery weather outside. After a day exploring the local valleys, grill up a storm on the supplied barbecue, or cook in style in the cutting-edge kitchen. Ideal for a large group, the property’s double garage facilitates multiple vehicles and differing schedules. 

Stonegate 7 is just 4 minute walk from the slopes, ensuring that guests focused on a dedicated ski vacation waste no time in transit. Buzzing Telluride is just a short drive away, offering diverse restaurants, happening ski taverns, shopping and absorbing museums. In warmer months, go hiking, horseback riding and fishing, or experience snow machine trips and famous winter festivals, including dazzling fire artistry and comedy events. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With its breath-taking mountain views of Steamboat Springs, this Colorado luxury home is the finest ski in, ski out vacation home in the Rocky Mountains. It offers all the high-end amenities and services (http://www.steamboatluxe.com/amenities.html) of a five-star hotel – such as a personal concierge, in-home spa services, and catered meals – with the comfort, sophistication and space of a modern mountain home.

When you take your first step into the grand, vaulted entry of this luxury home rental, you’ll be struck by its beauty. Tremendous care and attention have been given to the finest details in the home, from the lofty windows with striking views, to the sophisticated, yet comfy, décor, to the wonderful flow of space – ideal for entertaining or escaping.

The Over The Edge Home is undoubtedly Colorado's finest ski-in, ski out home available for rental. This newly constructed home is nestled high alongside Steamboat's legendary Mt. Werner, offering guests over 10,000 square feet of living space. Perfect for large families, corporate retreats or just a group of friends, we have no doubt that you will find our wonderful mountain retreat exceeds all of your expectations.

A stunning architectural achievement, this spectacular 7 bedroom, 7.5 bath home boasts an incredible facade of stone block, field stone and mahogany that blend seamlessly into the mountainside landscape. Once inside, guests enjoy a decor designed by TRH interiors, known internationally for their work with Ritz Carlton Club properties around the world.

We have spared no expense to provide our guests with every amenity they could possibly desire. The home boasts a gourmet kitchen equipped with Wolf and Subzero appliances that is perfect for both Mom's cooking or the gourmet chef we will be glad to set up for you. The design of the home allows for large dinner parties where friends remain connected and seating 24 comfortably at either of our two dining areas. Around the corner, but on the same floor, is a fully equipped bar with pool table, shuffleboard table, two large screen plasma television's, poker table and beautiful stone fireplace. Just plug in your I-pod when you arrive you can access your own music and playlists throughout the house.

Downstairs guests will find a comfortable den with 52 inch Plasma television, video games (both Wii and X-Box) and Blu-Ray DVD for a great place to relax after a long day on the slopes. Open another door and you will find a real movie theater, equipped with 12 leather seats and room for more on the floor, Apple TV, Blu-Ray DVD and HD cable television. The room is perfect for a movie night or watching a ball game during your stay. You'll never want to leave the home.

On Colorado's warm afternoons, our guests can enjoy three large decks, one off the lower level, one off the main living area and a spectacular rooftop deck with fireplace and heated deck for year round enjoyment. Lastly, when bedtime arrives you can relax in one of the 7 beautifully decorated bedrooms and 7 wonderful baths. The home boasts three master suites (perfect for three families!) each with king bed. The other rooms can be set-up for maximum comfort and convenience.

listing.listing_description:
You can have it all on a Napa and Sonoma escape to Twilight Ridge. Perched on a rise in the Mission Highlands area, this dreamy vacation rental offers incredible sunset views, a range of luxury amenities and a location close to the boutiques, galleries and restaurants of Sonoma Plaza. Its five bedrooms can accommodate up to ten friends or family members on a relaxed California holiday.

Look out over the surrounding vineyards and hills from expansive outdoor living areas with a pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. On cooler evenings, linger outside with a glass of a new favorite vintage or enjoy the media room, gas fireplace and Wi-Fi indoors.

Fold-away glass walls connect the outdoor living areas with the open-concept interiors for a seamless feel. A formal living room with an inviting stone fireplace and wood-paneled ceilings connects to the formal dining room by a few steps for easy entertaining. There’s also an open-plan great room with living and dining areas, plus a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

Twilight Ridge has three bedrooms with king beds: one master bedroom with a private en-suite bathroom, and two that share access to a hall bathroom. The other two bedrooms have queen beds; one has an en-suite and the other has access to its own bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are chic and contemporary, with whimsical touches such as leopard-print area rugs.

The villa is less than a 10-minute drive from both the natural beauty of the Sonoma Overlook Trail and the lively shopping and dining in Sonoma Plaza, where you can browse galleries of unique artwork or book a honeymoon-worthy dinner. It’s also close enough for a day trip to Bouverie Wildflower Preserve, Sonoma Valley Regional Park, Sonoma Raceway and several wineries.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ski slope views, cozy interiors and luxury amenities make Heavenly Peak 310 a paradise in the Rocky Mountains. Part of the One Steamboat Place community, this Colorado vacation rental offers guests access to shared resort facilities and a location just steps from the gondola. The modern, open-plan layout and four bedrooms can easily host up to eleven friends or family members on a ski holiday, golf getaway or outdoor adventure in beautiful Steamboat Springs.

One Steamboat Place invites guests to use the shared heated pool, hot tub, fitness center, games room, communal spaces and more. Take the complimentary winter shuttle service around the area, ask the ski valet for assistance with gear or inquire about excursions with the concierge. You can even let the kids make friends in the Little Tykes room while keeping an appointment in the resort’s lavish spa. After a day spent adventuring or relaxing, have a laid-back barbecue on the villa’s private balcony or step inside to warm up by the fireplace and flat-screen television.

Heavenly Peak 310 is designed to bring everyone together in the inviting central great room, where a roomy sectional and buttery leather armchairs are clustered around the fireplace. Celebrate a special occasion at the formal dining area, or refuel before your next ride up the gondola at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Four bedrooms let guests have space and privacy—the better to rest up for another day out in the mountains. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms: a master suite that’s set by itself on one side of the great room, and a second bedroom on the opposite side of the villa with a stand-alone bathtub straight out of a honeymoon suite. The other two bedrooms have bunk beds; one has an en-suite bathroom and the other is next to a hall bathroom.

While Steamboat Springs is known for its skiing, there’s plenty to do year-round in this natural wonderland. Test your skill on ski runs that have hosted World Cup competitions, or go easy with a little nighttime snow tubing. In the summer, tee off at the nearby Rollingstone Ranch golf course or fish, kayak and raft on the Yampa River. Don’t miss the area’s namesake hot springs, from the family-friendly pools at Old Town to the natural spring-fed ones at Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Zirkel Mountain is a private luxury residence within One Steamboat Place, a complex of gorgeous suites and world-class lodge and spa amenities at the foot of Mt. Werner. With four bedrooms that sleep ten, Zirkel Mountain is just the classy sanctuary you need after adventurous days on the Steamboat slopes.

With beautiful views of the surrounding valleys, the open-plan living room is an ideal space for spending evenings with family and friends. Relax in the lounge on the sumptuous sectional couch or supple leather armchairs, staying toasty by the wood-burning fire place and watching movies on the mounted flat screen television. Enjoy cooking in the fully equipped kitchen with Viking appliances, and fire up the Viking grill on the outdoor patio for some Southwest barbeque in the crisp air. At dinnertime, gather around the elegant wood dining table for ten. If you need to get some work done, there's even a small office and high-speed WiFi. Throughout the suite, the beautiful furnishings and tasteful, earthy décor evoke classic Colorado traditions.

Three of the four bedrooms feature king size beds. The master room has its own gas fire place set inside a lovely stone hearth, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and jetted tub. The second and third bedrooms also have ensuite bathrooms, one with shower/tub combo, one with stand-alone shower and tub. There's also a fourth room with a queen bed and double size bunk beds and access to the hallway bathroom.

One Steamboat Place is renowned for its world-class lodge amenities. As guests at Zirkel Mountain, you'll enjoy complimentary access to its gathering areas, including the beautiful Great Room, the game parlor, and the Little Tykes room for kids. In the evening, after a long day on the slopes, slip into the outdoor hot tub and heated swimming pool for a delicious soak.

In addition to being literally steps from the Steamboat Gondola, One Steamboat Place is perfectly situated to give you prime access to the Old Town and surrounding attractions. For golf in the alpine air, head to Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course, just minutes away. And if those skiing muscles need some relief, head ten miles to Strawberry Park Natural Hot springs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The pitch of the waterslide echoes the slope of the hills across the way at this contemporary-chic waterfront home on Lake Austin. A fountain flows at the private entrance to this gated estate, and the property only offers more ways to enjoy the water, from a two-level boathouse and a pool facing the lake to alfresco living areas by the shore. It’s 15 miles from this quiet retreat to downtown. 

Wander into the lake from the sand beach or take the slide directly into the water. You can also splash in the infinity pool and hot tub on the deck. Challenge friends and family to a game on the bocce court, sit down to dinner from the barbecue at the alfresco table, and linger under the stars around the firepit. After dark, serve drinks from the indoor wet bar around the pool and shuffleboard tables or around the satellite TV and Wi-Fi. 

Cream-colored walls, hardwood floors, and details like a turned-leg china cupboard bring a refined air to the formal dining room and an open-concept great room with a sitting area, breakfast nook, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. But this vacation rental has a playful side, too, that shows up in elements like the koi-print wallpaper tucked away in one of the bathrooms. 

This luxury property has 2 bedrooms with king beds and ensuite bathrooms, including the master suite, and 4 bedrooms with queen beds: 1 with an ensuite bathroom, 1 with hall bathroom access, and 2 that share a hall bathroom. 

On warm days, spend the day in the water and the evening at a lantern-lit waterfront restaurant along the lake. It’s 7 miles to the 4 golf courses at Barton Creek Resort, 11 miles to the 3-acre Barton Springs Pool, and 15 miles to downtown Austin, where you’ll find everything from great live music and casual taco joints to one-of-a-kind holiday souvenirs and honeymoon-worthy restaurants, plus free tours of the Texas State Capitol building.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
